Element.Name: FINANCIAL INSTITUTION ADDRESS
Element.Description: (Aligned) — The address of the financial institution or its branch that holds the payment account.

Element.Name: Buyer address line 1
Element.Description: (Aligned) — The main address line in an address.

Element.Name: Buyer address line 2
Element.Description: (Aligned) — An additional address line in an address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line.

Element.Name: Buyer city
Element.Description: (Aligned) — The common name of the city, town or village, where the Buyer's address is located.

Element.Name: Buyer post code
Element.Description: (Aligned) — The identifier for an addressable group of properties according to the relevant postal service.

Element.Name: Buyer address line 3
Element.Description: (Aligned) — An additional address line in an address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line.

Element.Name: Buyer country code
Element.Description: (Aligned) — A code that identifies the country.
